T02TD2434E:48a-1: sho ka bhi no bhi drishti n'a ma /
T02TD2434E:48a-3: mya ngan gyi lta ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2434E:48a-4: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2434E:48a-5: bdag gi phung po ngan pa 'di //
T02TD2434E:48a-6: bla ma ham dang bral 'gyur bas //
T02TD2434E:48a-7: snang ba rnams ni nub par 'gyur //
T02TD2434E:48a-8: bla ma dam pa'i mya ngan gyis //
T02TD2434E:48a-9: ma hi la dag mya ngan gnas //
T02TD2434E:48a-10: bla ma ye shes mig med pas //
T02TD2434E:48a-11: phyogs mtshams gang yang mthong ba med //
T02TD2434E:48a-12: bla ma dam pa'i mya ngan gyis //
T02TD2434E:48a-13: ma ni bha dra bdag ni du //
T02TD2434E:48a-14: snying rje rnge chung gdugs dgar phub //
T02TD2434E:48a-15: rnal 'byor rgyal po mdzes pa'i bdag / sdig can gang gis spyan drangs nas //
T02TD2434E:48a-16: ma ni bha dra re ma dga' //
T02TD2434E:48a-17: grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yis //
T02TD2434E:48a-18: nam mkha'i dbyings su dkyil 'khor bzhengs //
T02TD2434E:48a-19: de dbus bla ma nor bu bzhugs //
T02TD2434E:48a-20: sems kyi gdung bas bdag lus bsregs //
T02TD2434E:48a-21: dha ma dh'u ma re ma dga' //
T02TD2434E:48a-22: skad cig gcig la k'a ma r'u//
T02TD2434E:48a-23: bla ma longs spyod thim par mthong //
T02TD2434E:48a-24: sna tshogs skad cig gcig la ni //
T02TD2434E:48a-25: rnam par dngos med mthong 'gyur bas //
T02TD2434E:48a-26: bla ma gshegs pas re ma dga' //
T02TD2434E:48a-27: nor dang long tsho thams cad spangs //
T02TD2434E:48a-28: srid la chags pa'i nga rgyal bcom //
T02TD2434E:48a-29: nor bu bzang po ma hi la //
T02TD2434E:48b-0: dha ma dh'u ma bdag @48b cag gi / dpal ldan bla ma med 'gyur bas //
T02TD2434E:48b-1: phyogs mtshams thams cad mun pas khebs //
T02TD2434E:48b-2: kye ma gnyis med da ma ru //
T02TD2434E:48b-3: nam mkha'i dbyings su gdung byas nas //
T02TD2434E:48b-4: gdung bas rnal 'byor bdag cag gis //
T02TD2434E:48b-5: bla ma'i gdung thal lus la byugs //
T02TD2434E:48b-6: de nyid spyi bor bsgom byas nas //
T02TD2434E:48b-7: snying rjes bha hu ri bdag gis bsad //
T02TD2434E:48b-8: bdud kyis khyer ba'i bha ri khyod //
T02TD2434E:48b-9: bla ma'i sku dgra khyod yin no //
T02TD2434E:48b-10: bdag cag khyod kyi mun pas bsgribs //
T02TD2434E:48b-11: bdag cag rnams kyis mdun ma byas //
T02TD2434E:48b-12: dug po gyon zhing skra rnams bregs //
T02TD2434E:48b-13: dbyug pa dang ni thod pa thogs//
T02TD2434E:48b-14: mya ngan lus rnams keng rus 'byung //
T02TD2434E:48b-15: kye ma rnal 'byor mi rtag go //
T02TD2434E:48b-16: bdag cag rnams kyis bha hu ri bcom //
T02TD2434E:48b-17: de bhi bhantu ko ti nas //
T02TD2434E:48b-18: sri mi li'i gnas chen phyed dang gsum //
T02TD2434E:48b-19: bla ma nag po'i lta ba yis //
T02TD2434E:48b-20: rnal 'byor drag po ma hi las //
T02TD2434E:48b-21: mkha' 'gro drug cu rtsa bzhi skrag//
T02TD2434E:48b-22: sre mi li bshags bha hu ri bsad //
T02TD2434E:48b-23: kye ma bla ma'i sku dgra bsgral //
T02TD2434E:48b-24: bdag cag mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro //
T02TD2434E:48b-25: mya ngan gyi lta ba zhes bya ba slob dpon ma hi la nas brgyud pa dha'u ris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
